main event: A bright object resembling a large ball of fire was observed streaking across the street near a home in Elkhart, Indiana.
interesting points: Witnesses reported the object appeared suddenly as they were returning home,The object disappeared quickly between the houses after its brief appearance, A neighbor saw a flash of light but thought it was flash photography, Scorched patches of grass were found in both the back and front yards after the sighting, The incident occurred on a clear, starry night with no other corroborating sightings.
witness description: the husband and daughter of the report author
